column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Brandon has done it again.  I went to Bavette's both nights this weekend.  Friday night just for drinks and loved the space so much we came back on Saturday for dinner.  The chandeliers
column3: and leather banquettes made me feel like I was in a different era and was perfect for a chilly fall night.  We tried a number of he specialty cocktails which were delicious.
